src:
Jelang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020, Fakhri Hanya Coret Fadhil
05 Nov 2019, 08:27 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Pelatih Timnas U-19, Fakhri Husaini, mengatakan seluruh pemainnya sudah siap tempur untuk menghadapi Hong Kong, Timor Leste, dan Korea Utara dalam Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Juru taktik berusia 54 tahuj ini mengungkapkan pemainnya sangat antusias untuk bisa tampil dihadapan publik Indonesia.
"Syukur sampai persiapan terakhir dalam kondisi sehat untuk bisa bermain semaksimal mungkin," kata Fakhri dalan konfrensi pers di Hotel Century Atlet, Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Pelatih asal Aceh ini mengaku menjelang laga perdana, dirinya harus mencoret satu pemain yakni Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah. Ia menyebutkan pemain penggantinya adalah Fadhillah Nur dari Diklat Ragunan. "Inti semua pemain dalam keadaan sangat siap untuk pertandingan Kualifikasi AFC Cup," kata dia.
Timnas U-19 akan mulai berjuang di babak kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 yang akan berlangsung di Stadion Madya dan Stadion Gelora Bung Karno pada 6-10 November 2019.
Indonesia berlaga di K, bersama Timor Leste, Hong Kong, dan Korea Utara. Nantinya juara grup dan empat peringkat kedua terbaik dari 11 grup akan lolos ke putaran final yang akan digelar di Uzbekistan.
Timnas U-19 sudah mempersiapkan diri dengan baik untuk ajang ini. Mereka melakukan rangkaian pemusatan latihan dan seleksi pemain di Bogor. Mereka juga telah menjalani uji coba lokal dan dua uji coba internasional melawan Timnas Cina U-19.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
Ahead of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup, Fakhri Only Cross Fadhil
05 Nov 2019, 08:27 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- U-19 national team coach Fakhri Husaini said all the players were ready to fight to face Hong Kong, Timor Leste and North Korea in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup. The 54-year-old tactician revealed his players were very enthusiastic to be able to appear before the Indonesian public.
"Thank God until the last preparations in a healthy condition to be able to play as much as possible," said Fakhri at a press conference at Century Athletes Hotel, Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The Aceh-based coach admitted that before the inaugural match, he had to cross out one player namely Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah. He mentioned the substitute player was Fadhillah Nur from Ragunan Education and Training Center. "The core of all the players is very ready for the AFC Cup Qualifiers," he said.
The U-19 national team will begin to fight in the qualifying round of the AFC U-19 2020 which will take place at Madya Stadium and Gelora Bung Karno Stadium on November 6-10 2019.
Indonesia competed in K, along with Timor Leste, Hong Kong and North Korea. Later the group winners and the four best second-ranked out of 11 groups will qualify for the finals which will be held in Uzbekistan.
U-19 national team has prepared themselves well for this event. They conducted a series of training camps and selection of players in Bogor. They have also undergone local trials and two international trials against the China U-19 national team.

IRSYAN HASYIM
